'''''gwend''''' or '''''gwenn''''' is a [[Sindarin]] noun with two meanings:

# "bond, friendship". It is related to the verb '''''gwedh''''', meaning "to bind". 
# "maiden". Compare with the suffix ''-[[wen]]''

==Examples==
* ''[[Arwen]]'' = "Noble Maiden"
* ''[[Morwen]]'' = "Dark Maiden"
